results.title: Shall we start?
results.detailTitle: Reach can transform your life.Swipe through to see how!

results.title: Home
results.detailTitle: Discover all of Reach's features, get instant updates and take immediate action on your health and wellbeing!

results.title: Health
results.detailTitle: Find the top care providers, book appointments, set medication reminders, upload your health records and track your health vitals, on the go.

results.title: Wellbeing
results.detailTitle: Choose your vision, build healthy habits, consult wellbeing coaches, connect with friends and learn how to improve your wellbeing.

results.title: Explore
results.detailTitle: Get instant access to any health or wellbeing feature by dragging the “Explore” tab to the top & pressing on the section you're interested in.

results.title: Profile
results.detailTitle: Everything related to you is housed in your Profile, including your current and on-going habits, account details and more.

results.title: You're ready!
results.detailTitle: That's it! You're all ready to start improving your health and wellbeing. And you can always find this tour again by visiting your profile section.
